      • Class com.example.battleship.model.Board

        class Board extends Object implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • board
            ArrayList<ArrayList<Board.State>> board
            The game board, represented as a 2D array of states.
          • BOARD_SIZE
            int BOARD_SIZE
            The size of the game board.
          • ships
            List<Ship> ships
            The list of ships on the board.
          • sunkShips
            int sunkShips
            The number of sunk ships.
          • username
            String username
            The username of the player.

      • Class com.example.battleship.model.Ship

        class Ship extends Object implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • direction
            Ship.Direction direction
            The direction of the ship (horizontal or vertical).
          • hits
            int hits
            The number of hits the ship has taken.
          • length
            int length
            The length of the ship.
          • tailX
            int tailX
            The x-coordinate of the ship's tail.
          • tailY
            int tailY
            The y-coordinate of the ship's tail.
          • type
            Ship.Type type
            The type of the ship (carrier, submarine, destroyer, frigate).
